ctx: intros m x y x' y' m1 m2 Hinv.

original: intros m x y x' y' m1 m2 Hinv. unfold m1, m2. intros [Hinv_m1 Hprec1]. assert (Hexf1 : expf m x y). unfold m1, cA_1. destruct m. simpl in Hinv_m1. tauto. simpl in Hinv_m1. tauto. assert (Hexf2 : expf m x' y'). unfold m1, cA_1. destruct m. simpl in Hinv_m1. tauto. simpl in Hinv_m1. tauto. assert (Hexf3 : expf m1 (cA_1 m one x) y). unfold m1, cA_1. simpl. rewrite Hprec1. rewrite Hprec1. apply expf_refl. assert (Hexf4: ~ expf m1 (cA_1 m one x') y'). unfold m1, cA_1. simpl. intros H. rewrite Hprec1 in H. apply Hprec1. apply H. apply nf_L0L0_IV in Hinv; try auto. rewrite Hinv. reflexivity.
